name: The Missing Few
summary:
The game is a Walking Simulator with light stealth elements in which you play a private detective that seeks to unravel the mystery of Staten. The main character will explore the small town to find clues that will eventually lead him to find out who or what is behind the mystery. 
 
Story (Brief) 
 
Following yet another disappearance in a series of strange events in the isolated rural town of Staten, private detective Jack Norwood decides to take matters into his own hands and find out who, or what, is behind the mystery. 
In 'The Missing Few', you play as Jack Norwood, a private detective who goes to the seeks to unravel the mystery of the disappearances in Staten. 
Figure out who or what is really behind the missing persons of this town.
